mapper.sql: f.CAPTION, f.FDESCRIBE, f.DESCRIPTION_DETAILS, f.DESCRIBE_TYPE, f.DESCRIPTION_CONTENT, f.DESCRIBE_CONTENT_BF, f.OTHER_DESCRIPTION_TYPE, f.OTHER_DESCRIPTION, f.RIGHT_OPTION_CONTENT, f.RIGHT_CONTENT_BF, f.SORT, f.FLASTUPDATEPEOPLE, f.FLASTUPDATETIME, f.FEXTEND1, f.FEXTEND2, f.FEXTEND3, f.FEXTEND4, f.FEXTEND5, f.FSERIAL_NUM, f.FINSEPCTION, f.TEMBILL_EXECUTEMX_ID, f.TEMBILL_EXECUTE_ID

CAPTION, FDESCRIBE, DESCRIPTION_DETAILS, DESCRIBE_TYPE, DESCRIPTION_CONTENT, DESCRIBE_CONTENT_BF, OTHER_DESCRIPTION_TYPE, OTHER_DESCRIPTION, RIGHT_OPTION_CONTENT, RIGHT_CONTENT_BF, SORT, FLASTUPDATEPEOPLE, FLASTUPDATETIME, FEXTEND1, FEXTEND2, FEXTEND3, FEXTEND4, FEXTEND5, FSERIAL_NUM, FINSEPCTION, TEMBILL_EXECUTEMX_ID, TEMBILL_EXECUTE_ID
mapper.update:
update
set CAPTION = #{CAPTION}, FDESCRIBE = #{FDESCRIBE}, DESCRIPTION_DETAILS = #{DESCRIPTION_DETAILS}, DESCRIBE_TYPE = #{DESCRIBE_TYPE}, DESCRIPTION_CONTENT = #{DESCRIPTION_CONTENT}, DESCRIBE_CONTENT_BF = #{DESCRIBE_CONTENT_BF}, OTHER_DESCRIPTION_TYPE = #{OTHER_DESCRIPTION_TYPE}, OTHER_DESCRIPTION = #{OTHER_DESCRIPTION}, RIGHT_OPTION_CONTENT = #{RIGHT_OPTION_CONTENT}, RIGHT_CONTENT_BF = #{RIGHT_CONTENT_BF}, SORT = #{SORT}, FLASTUPDATEPEOPLE = #{FLASTUPDATEPEOPLE}, FLASTUPDATETIME = #{FLASTUPDATETIME}, FEXTEND1 = #{FEXTEND1}, FEXTEND2 = #{FEXTEND2}, FEXTEND3 = #{FEXTEND3}, FEXTEND4 = #{FEXTEND4}, FEXTEND5 = #{FEXTEND5}, FSERIAL_NUM = #{FSERIAL_NUM}, FINSEPCTION = #{FINSEPCTION}, TEMBILL_EXECUTEMX_ID = TEMBILL_EXECUTEMX_ID where TEMBILL_EXECUTEMX_ID = #{TEMBILL_EXECUTEMX_ID}
mapper.select:
select
from f where f.TEMBILL_EXECUTE_ID = #{pd.TEMBILL_EXECUTE_ID}
and ( f.CAPTION LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FLASTUPDATEPEOPLE LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
[fhstart] order by f.SORT [fhend]

select count(*) zs from
where TEMBILL_EXECUTE_ID = #{TEMBILL_EXECUTE_ID}
